text: Hi! Sorry in advance if it's just me and I can't find a proper solution but - how about adding smart buttons in thank you messages after completing a form? I can't use HTML there nor I can select already configured button.

Hello <@U010X5N68QY>
I can see an option to Add Button on the thankyou tab while creating new forms.
Unfortunately it's not a smart button. I would like to localise the url it contains.
do you mean a custom link or a url?
I mean I would like to add two different urls and show one depending on where the user is located.
well this is not an option there in thankyou tab but since you have only 2 urls to localize then you can make it to work with 2 different pop-up forms and then add some targeting.
as in the targetting, we can select the country to show up the forms, and so I think this can help in showing the specific links on thankyou step.
That's the workaround I'm using now but ideally I wouldn't want to double all my forms just for one more localisation or possibly even more further down the road.
Thank you for answering so quickly though :slightly_smiling_face:
I tested when theme were in beta and it 100% worked. But testing it now it doesn't
